publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2401# Cathy Peattie: 15th Anniversaries of Greentrax and Kilbirnie Records-That the Parliament congratulates Greentrax and Kilbirnie Records on their 15th anniversaries; recognises the contribution of these companies, and in particular Ian Green, to traditional music in Scotland, and hopes that together they will continue to build upon their achievements.
S1M-2401# 15th Anniversaries of Greentrax and Kilbirnie Records (lodged on 2 November 2001) Mrs Mary Mulligan*
S1M-2401# 15th Anniversaries of Greentrax and Kilbirnie Records (lodged on 2 November 2001) Tommy Sheridan*
S1M-2401# 15th Anniversaries of Greentrax and Kilbirnie Records (lodged on 2 November 2001) Linda Fabiani*, Pauline McNeill*
S1M-2401# 15th Anniversaries of Greentrax and Kilbirnie Records (lodged on 2 November 2001) Dr Elaine Murray*, Mr Jamie Stone*
S1M-2401# 15th Anniversaries of Greentrax and Kilbirnie Records (lodged on 2 November 2001) Michael Russell*
S1M-2401# 15th Anniversaries of Greentrax and Kilbirnie Records (lodged on 2 November 2001) Mr Gil Paterson*
S1M-2401# 15th Anniversaries of Greentrax and Kilbirnie Records (lodged on 2 November 2001) Mr John Home Robertson*
S1M-2401# 15th Anniversaries of Greentrax and Kilbirnie Records (lodged on 2 November 2001) Mr Lloyd Quinan*
S1M-2401# 15th Anniversaries of Greentrax and Kilbirnie Records (lodged on 2 November 2001) Irene McGugan*
S1M-2401# 15th Anniversaries of Greentrax and Kilbirnie Records (lodged on 2 November 2001) Mr Kenneth Gibson*
